body:
So I was sitting on my computer, watching youtube and playing Town of Salem (flash version), when all of the sudden my screen freezes and a loud buzzing noise plays into my headphone. I have TS open, but I have no volume on it. Help? What should I do?


Also, if this means anything, I got VAC banned for CSGO a week ago or so, and I wasn't hacking. This happened on two of my accounts I randomly switch between. This is just in case this helps.


I don't wanna do anything with my computer in case I could mess something up. Help?

title: Bad Things, Need Help

replies.body:
idk about first

Do you use VibranceGUI or anything for your brightness?

replies.body: Please don't tell me you used my Steam for CS:GO...

replies.body: First happened to me few times. Reset button and it is over. Idk the reason, but it may be a virus or his effects.

replies.body: Gaben is taking his revenge on you for hacking, you're done for.
